blocks.subject: PLEASE REVIEW -- Changes to Northwestern Letter Agreement
raw_header: cc: Ben Jacoby/HOU/ECT@ECT, Chris Booth/NA/Enron@Enron, Catherine
Subject: PLEASE REVIEW -- Changes to Northwestern Letter Agreement
text: Attached are changes to the Northwestern 7EA Letter Agreement.  Per Ben
Jacoby's request, I have updated the Remaining Purchase Amount Instalment
(Schedule III) Amounts.  Catherine Clark in Global Finance has signed off on
these numbers, as well.  Please call me at x57968 if you have any questions.
